mapper.insert: insert into purchase_history (user_id, purchased_at, at_that_user_coin) values (#{userId}, now(), null)
insert into purchase_music (music_id, purchase_history_id, at_that_coin) values (#{musicId}, #{purchaseHistoryId}, 1)
mapper.update: update users u set u.coin = ( ifnull((select sum(c.coin) from coin_history c where c.user_id = #{userId}), 0) - ifnull((select count(pm.purchase_music_id) from purchase_history p join purchase_music pm on pm.purchase_history_id = p.purchase_history_id where p.user_id = #{userId}), 0) ) where u.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select ifnull(coin, 0) from users where user_id = #{value} for update
